name: npr
title: NPR
description: This chapter includes content provided by National Public Radio (NPR). Tap **Allow and continue** to load this content, or view [NPR's privacy policy](https://www.npr.org/about-npr/179878450/privacy-policy) for more information.
shortDescription: NPR (National Public Radio) is an American nonprofit media organisation based in Washington D.C. Details about collected data are available in NPR's [privacy policy](https://www.npr.org/about-npr/179878450/privacy-policy) and [terms of use](https://www.npr.org/about-npr/179876898/terms-of-use).

name: nukemap
title: Nukemap
description: This chapter includes content provided by Nukemap. Tap **Allow and continue** to load this content, or view [NPR's privacy policy](https://www.npr.org/about-npr/179878450/privacy-policy) for more information.
shortDescription: Nukemap is an interactive model of the effects of various nuclear weapons produced by Alex Wellerstein. Details are available in the [Nukemap FAQ](https://nuclearsecrecy.com/nukemap/faq/)
